content: अपचि {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To honour, respect. {@--2@} To invite respectfully. {@--3@} ({c5c} <ab>U.</ab>) To gather, collect. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be reduced in strength or bulk, sink, waste away; अपचितमपि गात्रं व्यायतत्वादलक्ष्यं <ls>Ś. 2. 9</ls> reduced in bulk, emaciated, lean; to wane, decline, diminish, grow less; राजहंस तव सैव शुभ्रता चीयते न च न चापचीयते <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--2@} To fall away from, be deprived of, lose (with <ab>abl.</ab>) प्रकृतिः सूयते तद्वदानंत्यान्नापचीयते <ls>Mb.</ls>
